name: Guardians of the Galaxy: Cosmic Rewind
description: Reverse-launch roller coaster through space with the Guardians
bestTime: First hour of park opening or virtual queue

name: Test Track
description: Design a virtual vehicle and test it at high speeds up to 65 mph

name: Mission: SPACE
description: Space flight simulator with Green (mild) and Orange (intense) missions

name: Soarin' Around the World
description: Hang gliding simulator over world landmarks

name: Frozen Ever After
description: Boat ride through Arendelle with Anna, Elsa, and Olaf

name: Remy's Ratatouille Adventure
description: Shrink to the size of a rat for a culinary adventure through Gusteau's restaurant

name: Spaceship Earth
description: Journey through the history of human communication inside the iconic geosphere

name: Living with the Land
description: Boat tour through greenhouses and agricultural exhibits

name: Journey into Imagination with Figment
description: Tour the Imagination Institute with Figment the purple dragon

name: The Seas with Nemo & Friends
description: Underwater clamobile adventure to find Nemo

name: Gran Fiesta Tour Starring The Three Caballeros
description: Boat ride through Mexico with Donald Duck and The Three Caballeros

name: Journey of Water, Inspired by Moana
description: Interactive outdoor trail celebrating the beauty and importance of water

name: Turtle Talk with Crush
description: Interactive conversation with Crush the sea turtle from Finding Nemo

name: The American Adventure
description: Spectacular audio-animatronic show celebrating American history

name: Impressions de France
description: Film showcase of France's beauty in the Palais du Cinéma

name: Beauty and the Beast Sing-Along
description: Sing-along film experience in the France pavilion

name: Canada Far and Wide in Circle-Vision 360
description: 360-degree film showcasing Canada's stunning landscapes

name: Reflections of China
description: 360-degree film tour of China's iconic landmarks

name: Awesome Planet
description: Film about Earth's beauty and environmental diversity in The Land

name: Disney & Pixar Short Film Festival
description: Collection of Pixar shorts in 4D with special effects

name: Luminous The Symphony of Us
description: Nighttime spectacular with fireworks, fountains, and lasers on World Showcase Lagoon

name: ImageWorks - The What-If Labs
description: Hands-on imagination activities after Journey Into Imagination

name: Mission: SPACE Advanced Training Lab
description: Space-themed games and interactive activities

name: SeaBase
description: Explore aquariums with sea life including dolphins, sharks, and manatees

name: Meet Anna and Elsa at Royal Sommerhus
description: Meet Anna and Elsa in their summer cabin in Norway

name: Meet Characters in World Showcase
description: Find Disney characters from around the world in their home pavilions

name: Club Cool
description: Sample free Coca-Cola beverages from around the world

name: Les Halles Boulangerie-Patisserie
description: Authentic French pastries and baked goods in France pavilion

name: Karamell-Küche
description: German caramel treats in Germany pavilion

name: Tangierine Café
description: Moroccan cuisine in Morocco pavilion

name: La Cantina de San Angel
description: Mexican fare with lagoon-side outdoor seating

name: Kringla Bakeri og Kafe
description: Norwegian pastries and school bread in Norway pavilion

name: Crêpes à Emporter by La Crêperie de Paris
description: Sweet and savory French crêpes at the France pavilion

name: Visit all 11 World Showcase Countries
description: Walk around the World Showcase Lagoon and visit each unique pavilion

name: Kidcot Fun Stops
description: Craft activities for kids at each World Showcase country

name: Jumping Fountains
description: Synchronized water fountains that leap between pools

name: Drink Around the World
description: Sample adult beverages from each World Showcase pavilion
